text:
Jaime Heliodoro Rodríguez Calderón (born 28 December 1957) is a Mexican politician. He was Governor of the northern state of Nuevo León. He is the first independent candidate to have won a governorship in Mexico. He served as mayor of García, Nuevo León (2009–2012) as a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI)
Rodríguez ran as an Independent candidate for President of Mexico in the 2018 presidential race.
